price: (Mariyamu) aravuga ati “Mu by’ukuri niragije Nyagasani Nyirimpuhwe ngo andinde ikibi cyaguturukaho, niba koko utinya Imana (ntunyegere).”
arabic: قَالَتۡ إِنِّيٓ أَعُوذُ بِٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مِنكَ إِن كُنتَ تَقِيّٗا

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qālat innī aʿūdhu bil-raḥmāni minka in kunta taqiyyan
